review_data.title: Nicht nur Pizzas
review_data.content: Ueber Mittag manchmal etwas voll, trotzdem immer sehr freundliche Bedienung. Pizzas absolut empfehlenswert, und auch die Wahl eines Tagesmenus ist...More

review_data.title: Speditiv und Gut
review_data.content: Bin um 13:30 angekommen und die Küche hatte noch geöffnet. Das Personal war sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend. Ich wurde schnell...More

review_data.title: Food Good
review_data.content: Food was good. Service was not. Hard time with communiction. Bar selection very limited. Price not bad.

review_data.title: Risotto mit Pouletfleisch und Gmües
review_data.content: Ganz fein, ganz nööch, dusse sitze möglich, schnälli Bedienig, faire Priis! Und halt guete Food... Rivella grüen au vorhande. Am...More

review_data.title: Fresh and quick pizza
review_data.content: We stopped by for a quick lunch since our hotel, the Continental, was just down the street. Service was quick, and the pizza was fresh.

review_data.title: Near Marriott hotel
review_data.content: Nice little Italian restaurant within walking distance of Marriott. Pizza and salad very good. spaghetti looked great, many locals @ lunch ordered the spaghetti.

review_data.title: No English, but Aim to Please
review_data.content: We stopped by for lunch and were pleasantly surprised by the hospitality. Although no one spoke English, and we did not speak German nor Italian, the staff bent over backwards to communicate and make sure we enjoyed our meal.
